name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle the mint and the lime.  Then add all ingredients to a shaker, along with ice.  Shake well.

name: Bees Nees
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker, along with ice.  Shake well.

name: Caipirinha
instructions: Cut the ends off the lime. Cut in half, and remove the pith.  Cut each half into four pieces.  Place 4 peices in a glass, and muddle the other 4 pieces with the brown sugar.  Then add the rum and muddled mixture to a shaker, along with ice.  Shake well.
